div.p: Greetings. I recently wrote to you extensively. In the meantime, I received your letters along with copies of the Turkish history. I gave them to those to whom they were intended; they all thank you. I recognize your style in that history; therefore, I wonder why you added Erb's name. Meanwhile, the people of Strasbourg wrote friendly letters to us and in these, the following news, the most important of which I have copied here for you. I cannot add anything else now. It is said that in about two months, we will hear new wonders from France. May God send it all for the best. Amen.
Lord Steiger himself writes to you. All the others greet you; I also wish health to all of yours.
